user_profile: User 3 is an outgoing and community-oriented adult female in her late 20s, likely holding a college degree and belonging to the middle socioeconomic class. With a tendency to enjoy both social and solitary activities, such as movies and food outings, User 3 thrives on varied experiences while maintaining a stable routine.
